channel.title: Diary on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Diary on mattischrome

item.title: In Praise of Putting Pen to Paper
item.description: Around this time last year, I wrote in praise of writing a diary. I also rather misanthropically referred to it as a “negativity casket” because I found that I was pouring a lot of negative feelings into the notebook. It’s not really a diary as such because I don’t write everyday and I also make other non-diaristic notes, but it does appear to have been something of a process that has helped me to work through my negative feelings.

item.title: The Negativity Casket
item.description: One of the things that people tend to start around this time of year is a diary. They usually get filled for as long as your new year’s resolutions last.
